channel.title: PhatzPvP - Cammy pvp server from 2009 delta
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i779.photobucket.com/albums/yy71/lostmyphat/phatzpvpgreen.png[/img] [img]http://i46.servimg.com/u/f46/16/86/86/10/untitl14.png[/img] [img]http://s2.postimage.org/1waex5o10/9j41t1.png[/img][b] - Home - [/b] None atM [img]http://s2.postimage.org/1w9wq8ulg/259ye89.gif[/img] [b]- Client - [/b]http://up.ht/LU0MXJ [img]http://s4.postimage.org/31ieldkkk/webclient.png[/img] - Webclient - http://goo.gl/NOxVv
[center][b]WE ARE ALSO COMPLETELY MOPASRCAPE CLIENT COMPATBIEL/NORMAL 317 CLIENT![/b][/center]
Welcome to phatzpvp! We were once a very well known cammy pvp server about 2 years ago, but shut down due to hosting problems. We are now running on a 2GB VPS, guaranteed 100% uptime! We currently have one mod, Dylan, and no administrators. Spots are open!
What we aim for: Any other cammy pvp server normally lasts about a week or less. I am Devoted on this project, and hope to bring back what phatzpvp was and some better features. There will neverbe any rollbacks dupe to dupes, server problems, etc. This brings us to the server features: ::dice command flower game 100% pvp Changed fairy rewards Fixed headicons Fixed trading No lag, antilag system. In game ::votem ::voter ::voters MUCH MUCH MORE!
[img]http://i779.photobucket.com/albums/yy71/lostmyphat/fally1.png[/img] [img]http://i779.photobucket.com/albums/yy71/lostmyphat/fally3.png[/img] [img]http://i779.photobucket.com/albums/yy71/lostmyphat/fally2.png[/img] [img]http://i779.photobucket.com/albums/yy71/lostmyphat/serverd1.png[/img] [img]http://i779.photobucket.com/albums/yy71/lostmyphat/serverd3.png[/img] [img]http://i779.photobucket.com/albums/yy71/lostmyphat/serverd4.png[/img] [img]http://i779.photobucket.com/albums/yy71/lostmyphat/serverd5.png[/img] [img]http://i779.photobucket.com/albums/yy71/lostmyphat/serverd6.png[/img] [img]http://i779.photobucket.com/albums/yy71/lostmyphat/serverd7.png[/img] [img]http://i779.photobucket.com/albums/yy71/lostmyphat/serverd8.png[/img] [img]http://i779.photobucket.com/albums/yy71/lostmyphat/serverd9.png[/img] [/center]

[center]WE ARE ALSO COMPLETELY MOPASRCAPE CLIENT COMPATBIEL/NORMAL 317 CLIENT![/center]

Welcome to phatzpvp! We were once a very well known cammy pvp server about 2 years ago, but shut down due to hosting problems. We are now running on a 2GB VPS, guaranteed 100% uptime! We currently have one mod, Dylan, and no administrators. Spots are open!

What we aim for:
Any other cammy pvp server normally lasts about a week or less. I am Devoted on this project, and hope to bring back what phatzpvp was and some better features. There will neverbe any rollbacks dupe to dupes, server problems, etc.
This brings us to the server features:
::dice command
flower game
100% pvp
